dialogue.string: 1�What shall you do?Nothing.Have benefits bestowed upon you.Check active benefits.
1�Which benefit?None.Bayld+.Obsidian Fragments+.Attack+.Defense+.Magic Attack+.Magic Defense+.Map Obtainment.HP & MP Recovery+.TP3000+.HP+.MP+.Movement Speed+.Defensive Measures.

1�Receive the effect of  �[Bayld+/Obsidian Fragments+/Attack+/Defense+/Magic Attack+/Magic Defense+/Map Obtainment/HP & MP Recovery+/TP3000+/HP+/MP+/Movement Speed+]?Yes.No.
1�The amount of time you have to meet your goals, the interval between which foes spawn, and the time it takes them to arrive at cantonments will all be decreased.
1�Receive the effect of  �[Stockade Cons. 1/Stockade Cons. 2/Cantonment Rest./Stockade Cons. 3/Stockade Cons. 4/Dec. Def. Time]?Yes.No.
1�An inexplicable force possesses the recipient that allows them to obtain fenestral fragments.

1�What shall you do? (Current Lv.: 
�)Nothing for now.Call forth a Valiant.Amend the Ars Monstrum.Convert to Puissance.Acquire a map.Bolster pets.Read an explanation.
1�Read up on which topic?None of these.Objectives.Puissance.Valiant.Valiant Shijin.Amending the Ars Monstrum.Acquiring maps.Bolstering pets.
1�Fulfillment of the primary objective, vanquishing the enemy stronghold, is impeded by the Malicious: enemies who threaten intruders at every turn.
1�The Malicious and their stronghold boast supernatural defenses, so the ??Valiant??--friendly reinforcements who can be called forth to battle--are critical in thwarting them.
1�However, Valiant alone are incapable of dealing the final blow to the enemy stronghold, so it falls to the pioneer and his compatriots to bring the axe down.
1�The objective will be deemed a failure should the foes advance upon and destroy your marchland.
1�In short, the Valiant can halt the approach of the Malicious, protecting the marchlands.
1�As the name implies, Puissance is a type of energy gained from Noetic Ascensions and besting elemental fiends known as ??Escalents.??

1�Note that up to 
� obsidian fragment?�[/s] may be converted into motes of Puissance once per floor.

1�Specifically, 
� obsidian fragment?�[/s] may be converted into 
 mote?[/s] of Puissance.

1�Proceeding to the next layer of the skirmish will leave you with the default value of 
� motes of Puissance.
1�The Valiant are the physical forms of Puissance made manifest.
1�The Valiant will automatically assault the enemies' stronghold and engage in combat with the Malicious.

1�Up to 
� of the same Valiant may be summoned at a given time.
1�Increasing the Ars Monstrum's level will enable you to summon additional varieties of the Valiant.
1�Each Valiant is suited to fighting different Malicious foes, as each has bonuses and penalties against a certain type.
1�Valiant Shijin may also be summoned with Puissance in the same way as ordinary Valiant.
1�Which Shijin is summoned depends on the type of eudaemon part used to construct the simulacrum.
1�Only one Valiant Shijin may be called forth, but its effects will be felt on all creatures within the alluvion skirmish.
1�Players may use motes of Puissance to amend the Ars Monstrum, thereby increasing its level.
1�An amended Ars Monstrum will enable you to summon additional varieties of the Valiant, as well as increase their level.

1�The Ars Monstrum's maximum level is 
�, but advancing to the next section will reset it to 
.
1�A map of the current skirmish is available for a nominal cost in the form of motes of Puissance.
1�Note that the map will be destroyed upon advancing to the next layer.
1�Certain eudaemon parts enable the bolstering of your pets' resistance in exchange for a small donation of motes of Puissance.
